Description: Bronze statuette of the sacred Egyptian bull Apis with a Greek inscription recording its dedication to "Panepi" (Apis) by a worshipper named Sokydes.
Bibliographic references: Bronze / Catalogue of the Bronzes in the British Museum. Greek, Roman & Etruscan. (3208)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2016 19 May-27 Nov, BM exhibition Sunken Treasures 2018 27 Mar-9 Sep, Los Angeles, Getty Centre, Egypt-Greece-Rome: Cultures in Contact
